roleset.name: to agree or cooperate
roleset.note: CONCUR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'concur' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from concur.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: He said that in this case he concurred with the State Department 's decision that Mr. Ahmad should be extradited [*-1] .
example.arg: with the State Department 's decision that Mr. Ahmad should be extradited [*-1]

roleset.name: coincide with, co-occur
roleset.note: CONCURRENT-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from concurrent.01-j)

example.name: Both args
example.text: The mucinous mass is subjacnt and concurrent with the mucosal ulcer
